question:
Consider the following statements about the Commission for Agricultural Costs & Prices (CACP):
  1. It is mandated to recommend minimum support prices (MSPs)
  2. Union Agriculture Minister is the ex-officio chairperson of the commission
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is correct. Second statement is incorrect. The Commission for Agricultural Costs & Prices (CACP) is an attached office of the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare, Government of India. It came into existence in January 1965. Currently, the Commission comprises a Chairman, Member Secretary, one Member (Official) and two Members (Non-Official).Â It is mandated to recommend minimum support prices (MSPs)
